about_the_game:
OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! Ride with your physical cycling machine, an ANT+ USB hardware dongle and an ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer. You will ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. OrbRider puts you in control your fitness environment, with the ability to control the weather, day and night cycles and the intensity of your workouts, all with the goal of making it fun!
​
ADDITIONAL EQUIPMENT REQUIRED
OrbRider is only compatible with ANT+ enabled devices including, smart trainers, heart rate monitors, speed and cadence sensors.

Warning. This game contains flashing lights, images, and other luminous stimulations which may induce epileptic seizures in certain individuals. This can be most intense during storms with random lightning flash. If you or anyone in your household has an epileptic condition, please consult your doctor before playing any Game. If you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions while playing, please immediately discontinue playing the Game and consult your doctor.

OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! Ride with your physical cycling machine, an ANT+ USB hardware dongle and an ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer. You will ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. OrbRider puts you in control your fitness environment, with the ability to control the weather, day and night cycles and the intensity of your workouts, all with the goal of making it fun!
​
ADDITIONAL EQUIPMENT REQUIRED
OrbRider is only compatible with ANT+ enabled devices including, smart trainers, heart rate monitors, speed and cadence sensors.

Warning. This game contains flashing lights, images, and other luminous stimulations which may induce epileptic seizures in certain individuals. This can be most intense during storms with random lightning flash. If you or anyone in your household has an epileptic condition, please consult your doctor before playing any Game. If you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions while playing, please immediately discontinue playing the Game and consult your doctor.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 13.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 1536 MB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The macOS and PC versions will differ in functionality and features.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13.3
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 Silicon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The macOS and PC versions will differ in functionality and features.

name: OrbRider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The macOS and PC versions will differ in functionality and features.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The macOS and PC versions will differ in functionality and features.

short_description: OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! You ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. Personal ANT+ USB hardware dongle and ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer equipment required.
